column2: Hm? Did you call for me just now?

old:
いや、覚者さまに自分ごときが
声をかけられるなんて、と思いましてね
column2: No, for someone like me to be approached by an Arisen, I couldn't believe it.

old:
あんまり雑談してると
後で叱られそうなんで、この辺で！
column2: If we keep chatting too much, I might get scolded later, so let's stop here!

old: この戦争、いつ終わるんですかね――
column2: When will this war—when will it end?
